Jeff, before you leave just take a look at:

http://www.ai-junkie.com/ann/evolved/nnt1.html

I recommend reading it (or printing). The author (Mat Buckland) has a
great book entitled: "AI Techniques for Game Programming" where he
describes ANN in a simple way. It also has a entire chapter on NEAT!
It's worth taking a look.

Have a good trip!

On 12/14/06, Jeff Clune <jclune@...> wrote:
>
>
